activities: With the exception of an email address or phone number for customer contact purposes and on the QTS website at http://www.qualitytech.com, QTS does not  receive personal data from the EU/EEA or Switzerland. Typically most of the data QTS receives is explicitly given to QTS by a customer for services or an employee for employment.  QTS does not currently have employees in the EU/EEA or Switzerland.  Data is retained in perpetuity unless destruction/deletions/removal is requested by customer. We do not access the data on our customers servers. Customers provide their own Network Security.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer contact information.  Does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau (BBB EU Safe Harbor) Dispute Resolution Mechanism pursuant to http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution/participation-agreement.
